title: U.S. price difference between legal and illegal cannabis as of January 2016 , by state
summary: This grouped bar chart represents 6 different States on X-axis for 2 groups Dispensary price, and Street price. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Average price per ounce in USD.
Out of all 2 groups, Dispensary price had the highest Average price per ounce in USD in State Michigan and Street price had the lowest Average price per ounce in USD in State Oregon.
In State Michigan, Dispensary price had the maximum Average price per ounce in USD and it saw the lowest in State Oregon out of all 6 States.
There is a gap of 87.0 between the highest and lowest Average price per ounce in USD found for Dispensary price in State Michigan and Oregon.
yAxis: Average price per ounce in USD
min_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 6 different States on X-axis for 2 groups Dispensary price, and Street price. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Average price per ounce in USD.
In State Michigan, Dispensary price had the highest Average price per ounce in USD 301.0 among the 2 groups and in Oregon, Street price had the lowest Average price per ounce in USD 191.0.
mid_summary: This grouped bar chart represents 6 different States on X-axis for 2 groups Dispensary price, and Street price. On the Y-axis it shows their corresponding Average price per ounce in USD.
Out of all 2 groups, Dispensary price had the highest Average price per ounce in USD in State Michigan and Street price had the lowest Average price per ounce in USD in State Oregon.
In State Michigan, Dispensary price had the maximum Average price per ounce in USD and it saw the lowest in State Oregon out of all 6 States.
There is a gap of 87.0 between the highest and lowest Average price per ounce in USD found for Dispensary price in State Michigan and Oregon.
max_summary: This grouped bar chart shows Average price per ounce in USD on the Y-axis for 6 different States for 2 groups Dispensary price, and Street price that are presented on the X-axis.
In State Michigan, Dispensary price had the highest Average price per ounce in USD 301.0 among the 2 groups and in Oregon, Street price had the lowest Average price per ounce in USD 191.0.
Among all the States, Dispensary price had the highest Average price per ounce in USD 301.0 in State Michigan and lowest value 214.0 in State Oregon.
State Michigan and Oregon had the biggest gap of 87.0 between the highest and lowest Average price per ounce in USD found for Dispensary price.
Among all 2 groups, Dispensary price had the gap of 87.0 between the maximum and minimum Average price per ounce in USD observed in State Michigan and Oregon respectively.

On average, the State Michigan had the highest Average price per ounce in USD for all 2 groups Dispensary price, and Street price. Whereas Oregon had the lowest average Average price per ounce in USD.
